titleStmt.title: The vvittie faire one· A comedie. As it was presented at the Private House in Drury Lane. By her Maiesties Servants. By Iames Shirley.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Wil. Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop, neere Furnivals-Inne Gate, in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The witty faire one.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, neere Furnivals-Inne Gate, in Holborne
